channel.title: CVE Feed for McAfee -- DLP ePO extension
channel.description: The latest CVEs for McAfee -- DLP ePO extension

item.title: CVE-2020-7302|2024-08-04T09:25:49.041Z -- mcafee -- dlp%20epo%20extension
item.description: Unrestricted Upload of File with Dangerous Type in McAfee Data Loss Prevention (DLP) ePO extension prior to 11.5.3 allows authenticated attackers to upload malicious files to the DLP case management section via lack of sanity checking.

item.title: CVE-2020-7304|2024-08-04T09:25:49.056Z -- mcafee -- dlp%20epo%20extension
item.description: Cross site request forgery vulnerability in McAfee Data Loss Prevention (DLP) ePO extension prior to 11.5.3 allows authenticated remote attacker to embed a CRSF script via adding a new label.

item.title: CVE-2020-7305|2024-08-04T09:25:48.994Z -- mcafee -- dlp%20epo%20extension
item.description: Privilege escalation vulnerability in McAfee Data Loss Prevention (DLP) ePO extension prior to 11.5.3 allows a low privileged remote attacker to create new rule sets via incorrect validation of user credentials.

item.title: CVE-2020-7301|2024-08-04T09:25:49.031Z -- mcafee -- dlp%20epo%20extension
item.description: Cross Site scripting vulnerability in McAfee Data Loss Prevention (DLP) ePO extension prior to 11.5.3 allows authenticated attackers to trigger alerts via the file upload tab in the DLP case management section.

item.title: CVE-2020-7303|2024-08-04T09:25:49.063Z -- mcafee -- dlp%20epo%20extension
item.description: Cross Site scripting vulnerability in McAfee Data Loss Prevention (DLP) ePO extension prior to 11.5.3 allows authenticated remote user to trigger scripts to run in a user's browser via adding a new label.

item.title: CVE-2020-7300|2024-08-04T09:25:49.062Z -- mcafee -- dlp%20epo%20extension
item.description: Improper Authorization vulnerability in McAfee Data Loss Prevention (DLP) ePO extension prior to 11.5.3 allows authenticated remote attackers to change the configuration when logged in with view only privileges via carefully constructed HTTP post messages.
